Index entries for sequences related to boustrophedon transform
mathematica: Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 9}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 23 2019 *)
program: a227862_tabl = map snd $ iterate ox (False, [1]) where
ox (turn, xs) = (not turn, if turn then reverse ys else ys)
where ys = scanl (+) 1 (if turn then reverse xs else xs)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 01 2013
